stars.name: Piercing
stars.description: Grants 350 Offensive Penetration per stage.

stars.name: Flawless Ritual
stars.description: Increases your chance to apply a Magical status effect by 30% per stage.

stars.name: Battle Mastery
stars.description: Increases your chance to apply a Martial status effect by 30% per stage.

stars.name: War Mage
stars.description:
Grants 100 Weapon and Spell Damage to Magical attacks.

Affects Magic, Flame, Frost, and Shock Damage.

stars.name: Mighty
stars.description:
Grants 100 Weapon and Spell Damage to Martial attacks.

Affects Physical, Poison, Disease, and Bleed Damage.

stars.name: Weapons Expert
stars.description: Increases your damage done with Light and Heavy Attacks by 4% per stage.

stars.name: Force of Nature
stars.description: Increases your Offensive Penetration by 660 for every status effect your target has.

stars.name: Exploiter
stars.description: Increases your damage done against Off Balance enemies by 2% per stage.

stars.name: Blessed
stars.description: Increases your Healing Done by 1% per stage.

stars.name: Salve of Renewal
stars.description: Whenever you remove a harmful effect from yourself or an ally, you sanctify the ground beneath them and heal them and allies within 8 meters for 1280 Health per stage. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.

stars.name: Hope Infusion
stars.description:
Healing yourself or an ally under 50% Health grants them Minor Heroism for 1 second for every 300 Magicka Recovery you have. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds per target.

Current duration: 1.5 seconds

stars.name: From the Brink
stars.description: Whenever you heal yourself or an ally under 25% Health, you grant them a damage shield that absorbs up to 2200 damage per stage, for 6 seconds. This effect can occur once every 30 seconds per target.

stars.name: Enlivening Overflow
stars.description: Overhealing yourself or an ally grants them Health, Magicka, and Stamina Recovery equal to .5% of your Max Magicka, up to a cap of 150, for 6 seconds. This effect can occur once every 12 seconds per target.

stars.name: Resilience
stars.description: Grants 132 Critical Resistance per stage.

stars.name: Preparation
stars.description: Reduces your damage taken from non-player attacks by 5% per stage.

stars.name: Elemental Aegis
stars.description:
Reduces the damage you take from Magical attacks by 1% per stage.

Affects Magic, Flame, Frost, and Shock Damage.

stars.name: Hardy
stars.description:
Reduces the damage you take from Martial attacks by 1% per stage.

Affects Physical, Poison, Disease, and Bleed Damage.

stars.name: Quick Recovery
stars.description: Increases your healing received by 1% per stage.

stars.name: Ironclad
stars.description: Reduces your damage taken by direct damage attacks by 3% per stage.

stars.name: Arcane Supremacy
stars.description: Increases Max Magicka by 26 per stage.

stars.name: Backstabber
stars.description: Increases your Critical Damage done by 2% per stage against enemies you are flanking.

stars.name: Biting Aura
stars.description: Increases your damage done with area of effect attacks by 3% per stage.

stars.name: Bulwark
stars.description: While you have a Shield or Frost Staff equipped, your Spell and Physical Resistance is increased by 1900.

stars.name: Cleansing Revival
stars.description: Healing a target under 25% Health removes all harmful effects from them. This effect can occur once every 24 seconds.

stars.name: Cutting Defense
stars.description: You deal 0 Magic Damage to attackers whenever they damage you with a direct damage attack within 7 meters. This effect scales off the higher of your Physical or Spell Resistance and can activate your Weapon Enchantments and Poisons.

stars.name: Deadly Aim
stars.description: Increase your damage done with single target attacks by 3% per stage.

stars.name: Duelist's Rebuff
stars.description: Reduces your damage taken by single target attacks by 3% per stage.

stars.name: Eldritch Insight
stars.description: Grants 260 Max Magicka per stage.

stars.name: Endless Endurance
stars.description: Increases your Max Stamina by 26 per stage.

stars.name: Enduring Resolve
stars.description: Reduces your damage taken by damage over time attacks by 3% per stage.

stars.name: Fighting Finesse
stars.description: Increases your Critical Damage and Critical Healing done by 4% per stage.

stars.name: Focused Mending
stars.description: Increases your Healing Done with single target heals by 2% per stage.

stars.name: Foresight
stars.description: After you drink a potion, the cost of your Magicka and Stamina healing abilities used within 6 seconds are reduced by 75%.

stars.name: Last Stand
stars.description: When you take damage below 20% Health you gain Major Heroism, granting 3 Ultimate every 1.5 seconds for 9 seconds. This effect can occur once every 9 seconds.

stars.name: Master-at-Arms
stars.description: Increases your damage done with direct damage attacks by 3% per stage.

stars.name: Occult Overload
stars.description: Whenever you kill an enemy under the effect of a status effect, they violently explode for 1037 Oblivion Damage per stage to all other enemies in a 4 meter radius, and applying a random status effect to each enemy hit. This effect can occur once every second.

stars.name: Precision
stars.description: Grants 160 Critical Chance per stage.

stars.name: Reaving Blows
stars.description: When you deal direct damage you heal for 7% of the damage done.

stars.name: Reinforced
stars.description: When you begin Bracing, you gain a damage shield that absorbs 5140 damage for 3 seconds. This effect can occur once every 10 seconds.

stars.name: Rejuvenator
stars.description: Grants 41 Weapon and Spell Damage to your healing abilities per stage.

stars.name: Riposte
stars.description: When you block an attack from an enemy within 7 meters, your next direct damage attack made within 5 seconds deals 33% additional damage. This effect can occur once every 5 seconds.

stars.name: Soothing Tide
stars.description: Increases your Healing Done by area of effect heals by 2% per stage.

stars.name: Swift Renewal
stars.description: Increases your Healing Done with healing over time effects by 2% per stage.

stars.name: Thaumaturge
stars.description: Increases your damage done with damage over time effects by 3% per stage.

stars.name: Tireless Discipline
stars.description: Grants 260 Max Stamina per stage.

stars.name: Unassailable
stars.description: Reduces your damage taken by area of effect attacks by 3% per stage.

stars.name: Untamed Aggression
stars.description: Increases your Weapon and Spell Damage by 3 per stage.

stars.name: Wrathful Strikes
stars.description: Grants 41 Weapon and Spell Damage to your damaging abilities per stage.

stars.name: Mystic Tenacity
stars.description: Reduces the duration of Elemental Status Effects applied to you by 5% per stage.

stars.name: Sustained by Suffering
stars.description: Increases your Health, Magicka, and Stamina Recovery by 30 per stage while under the effects of a negative effect.

stars.name: Relentlessness
stars.description: Being Stunned or Feared causes you to gain Major Protection for 3 seconds, reducing your damage taken by 10%.

stars.name: Pain's Refuge
stars.description: Reduces your damage taken by 2% for every 2 negative effects active on you, up to a maximum of 20%.

stars.name: Nimble Protector
stars.description: Increases your Movement Speed while Bracing by 3% per stage.

stars.name: Ward Master
stars.description: Reduces your damage taken by 2% per stage while Blocking and under the effects of a Damage Shield.

stars.name: Bracing Anchor
stars.description: While in combat, increase the amount of damage you can block by 4% per stage, but reduces your Movement Speed by 16% at all stages.

stars.name: Soothing Shield
stars.description: When you successfully block an attack you have a 15% chance to restore 147 Health per stage.

stars.name: Hasty
stars.description: Increases your movement speed when Sprinting by 2% per stage.

stars.name: Celerity
stars.description: Increases your Movement Speed by 2% per stage.

stars.name: Refreshing Stride
stars.description: While Sprinting you gain 100 Health and Magicka Recovery per stage.

stars.name: Thrill of the Hunt
stars.description: Whenever you kill an enemy you gain Major Expedition for 3 seconds per stage, increasing your Movement Speed by 30%.

stars.name: Arcane Alacrity
stars.description: While under the effects of a damage shield your Roll Dodge costs 160 less Stamina per stage.

stars.name: Bashing Brutality
stars.description: Increases your Bash damage by 60 per stage.

stars.name: Bastion
stars.description: Increases the effectiveness of your damage shields and damage against shielded enemies by 3% per stage.

stars.name: Bloody Renewal
stars.description: Restore 300 Stamina per stage, whenever you kill an enemy.

stars.name: Boundless Vitality
stars.description: Grants 28 Max Health per stage.

stars.name: Defiance
stars.description: Reduces the cost of Break Free by 110 Stamina per stage.

stars.name: Expert Evasion
stars.description: Your next Roll Dodge is free of cost. After consuming this effect, you cannot gain it again for 30 seconds.

stars.name: Fortification
stars.description: Increases the amount of damage you can block by 2% per stage.

stars.name: Fortified
stars.description: Grants 34.6 Armor per stage.

stars.name: Hardened
stars.description: Increases the duration of Crowd Control Immunity by 3% per stage.

stars.name: Hero's Vigor
stars.description: Grants 280 Max Health per stage.

stars.name: Juggernaut
stars.description: While under the effects of Crowd Control Immunity, you take 1% less damage per stage.

stars.name: On Guard
stars.description: While under the effects of Crowd Control Immunity, increases the amount of damage you block by 2% per stage.

stars.name: Peace of Mind
stars.description: Increases Magicka and Health Recovery while under the effects of Crowd Control Immunity by 40 per stage.

stars.name: Piercing Gaze
stars.description: Increases your Stealth Detection by 1 meter per stage.

stars.name: Rejuvenation
stars.description: Grants 1.8 Health, Magicka, and Stamina Recovery per stage.

stars.name: Rousing Speed
stars.description: Reduces the cost of Sprint by 50 Stamina per stage, while under the effects of Crowd Control Immunity.

stars.name: Savage Defense
stars.description: Reduces the cost of Bash by 45 Stamina per stage.

stars.name: Shield Master
stars.description: Reduces the cost of your damage shield abilities by 2% per stage.

stars.name: Siphoning Spells
stars.description: Restore 300 Magicka per stage, whenever you kill an enemy.

stars.name: Slippery
stars.description: When you are affected by a disabling effect, you automatically Break Free for no cost. After using this effect, you become Winded and cannot trigger this effect or others like it for 21 seconds.

stars.name: Spirit Mastery
stars.description: Decreases the time it takes to resurrect an ally by 33%.

stars.name: Sprinter
stars.description: Reduces the cost of Sprint by 20 Stamina per stage.

stars.name: Strategic Reserve
stars.description: Gain 30 Health Recovery for every 10 Ultimate you have.

stars.name: Survival Instincts
stars.description: While afflicted with a Status Effect, your core combat skills cost 5% less per stage.

stars.name: Tempered Soul
stars.description: Return to life after resurrection with 5% more resources per stage.

stars.name: Tireless Guardian
stars.description: Reduces the cost of Block by 20 Stamina per stage.

stars.name: Tumbling
stars.description: Reduces the cost of Roll Dodge by 120 Stamina per stage.

stars.name: Unchained
stars.description: When you use Break Free, the cost of your next Stamina ability used within 5 seconds is reduced by 11% per stage.

stars.name: Angler's Instincts
stars.description: Increases your chance of catching higher quality fish, akin to fishing with another player. This effect can stack with other similar bonuses.

stars.name: Breakfall
stars.description: Reduces your fall damage taken by 7% per stage.

stars.name: Cutpurse's Art
stars.description: Increases the chance to get higher-quality loot when pickpocketing.

stars.name: Discipline Artisan
stars.description: Increases experience gain for currently active skills and their skill lines by 3% per stage.

stars.name: Fade Away
stars.description: Escaping from a Guard wipes 25% of your current Heat, but not Bounty.

stars.name: Fleet Phantom
stars.description: Reduces the Movement Speed penalty of Sneak by 5% per stage.

stars.name: Fortune's Favor
stars.description: Increases the amount of gold you find in treasure chests and safeboxes by 10% per stage.

stars.name: Friends in Low Places
stars.description:
Removes 1000 gold from your bounty once per day when committing a crime where bounty is added.

You must be level 50 for this passive to activate, and your current bounty must be at or greater than 1000 gold.

stars.name: Gifted Rider
stars.description: Increases your Mount Speed by 2% per stage.

stars.name: Gilded Fingers
stars.description: Increases your gold gained by 2% per stage.

stars.name: Homemaker
stars.description: You have a 10% chance to find a second furnishing plan whenever you find a furnishing plan in the world.

stars.name: Infamous
stars.description: Increases the value of fenced items by 25%.

stars.name: Inspiration Boost
stars.description: Increases your crafting inspiration gained by 10% per stage.

stars.name: Liquid Efficiency
stars.description: Whenever you use a potion or poison you have a 10% chance to not consume it.

stars.name: Master Gatherer
stars.description: Reduces the time it takes to harvest by 10% per stage.

stars.name: Meticulous Disassembly
stars.description: Improves the chances of extracting Woodworking, Blacksmithing, Clothing, and Jewelry Crafting ingredients and allows the refining of more powerful resins, tempers, tannins, and platings from raw materials.

stars.name: Out of Sight
stars.description: Reduces the radius you can be detected while Sneaking by 1 meter per stage.

stars.name: Plentiful Harvest
stars.description: You have a 10% chance to gain double the yield from normal resource nodes per stage.

stars.name: Professional Upkeep
stars.description: Reduces the cost of repairing your armor by 1% per stage.

stars.name: Rationer
stars.description: Adds 10 minutes to the duration of any food or drink that increases your character's stats per stage.

stars.name: Reel Technique
stars.description: Decreases the time it takes for a fish to bite by 25%.

stars.name: Shadowstrike
stars.description: When you kill an enemy with Blade of Woe, you become invisible for 5 seconds after a short delay while distracting nearby enemies or potential witnesses. While under this effect you can cast Blade of Woe.

stars.name: Soul Reservoir
stars.description: When you resurrect yourself or another player you have a 33% chance to not consume a Soul Gem.

stars.name: Steadfast Enchantment
stars.description: Your Weapon Enchantments have a 10% chance to not consume a charge when activated per stage.

stars.name: Steed's Blessing
stars.description: Increases your out of combat Movement Speed by .4% per stage.

stars.name: Sustaining Shadows
stars.description: Reduces the cost of Sneak by 1% per stage.

stars.name: Treasure Hunter
stars.description: Increase the quality of items you find in treasure chests.

stars.name: Wanderer
stars.description: Reduces the cost of Wayshrine usage by 10% per stage.

stars.name: War Mount
stars.description: Improves your mastery with mounts, removing all mount Stamina costs outside of combat.
